well nobody has the full 4.6 version
both versions consist of three installation files each..only 4.4 is out 'fully' and only two out of three files are out for the 4.6 installer

and no, something is not better than nothing, because installing only 1 or 2 out of three install file will leave you without a lot of models..so a full 4.4 is way better than an incomplete 4.6

Hi 4X-AXG, I was under the impression that 4.6.3 adds to your basic Adobe Pack 4.4 AI. I was not aware it deletes any 4.4 planes on the install if that is what you mean.

If you mean you are missing some 4.6.1 and 4.6.2 planes but still still have all your 4.4 planes and the 4.6.3 planes, well...I'd love to have the 4.6.1 and 4.6.2 planes also.

I installed it and do not see any reduction in the number of old planes. I see an increase. Perhaps others will confirm yay or nay.

Cheers,

FP

This file will allow you to install Adobe's Traffic pack 4.6, parts 2 & 3. 

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3502904/PMDG_747F_Cargo_crack

Place the Enable Button & Adobe's Traffic pack 4.6, parts 2 & 3 into a folder. 

Run the enable button before you open the Adobe files.

Now, when you run the Adobe installer you should see that the "next" button is now clickable, keep trying different buttons until the installer works. 

Point the Abobe installer to a specific location or folder to allow the installer to install all the files.
So, we know that parts 2 and 3 are here thanks to saied. Can someone confirm that the PMDG crack allows install? And now, the question is, where can we get the 1st part?
YES the PMDG crack allows install. You'll end up with 3 folders. Aircraft, Scenery and Texture. 2.45 gigs of the best AI traffic bar none.
so can wnyone find part one?? i can tell i'm missing some 737s

Copy and paste all the aircraft folders into your Flight Simulator 9\Aircraft folder.

Copy and paste all the texture files into your Flight Simulator 9\Texture folder.

Copy and paste the Traffic_AdobeTP_4_6 file that's in the Adobe\Scenery\World\Scenery folder into your FlightSimulator9\Scenery\World\scenery folder.

That's it.

I have the first part (AdobeTP4.6_1.exe), but it is password-protected. Instead of babbling around, I will seed it and hope for anyone to give us the PW.

I won't recommend installing only Part 2 and 3 with the enable.exe, because the "continue"-button is disabled, because the installer doesn't find the first part of the installation - a good reason, I think! Who knows, what he's missing? Many fine aircrafts and flightplans - that's for sure... :)

So, let's hope for the best,
charonB
